name: Targeting Corrupt Leadership
description: Identifying and systematically neutralizing the influence of PSNs in leadership roles.

cards.title: Detecting Hidden PSN Leadership
cards.description: Analyzing behavioral patterns to expose covertly embedded PSNs in leadership positions.
bulletpoints: Identifying speech patterns, microexpressions, and behavioral inconsistencies.
Tracking influence networks to reveal connections between PSN operatives.
Analyzing decision-making anomalies that indicate manipulation or corruption.

cards.title: Forcing Leadership Instability
cards.description: Using pressure points to weaken and destabilize corrupt PSN leaders.
bulletpoints: Exploiting leadership weaknesses through strategic exposure.
Creating internal conflicts within their network to force disunity.
Amplifying public scrutiny and investigative interest to remove their authority.

cards.title: Tactical Leadership Replacement
cards.description: Strategically positioning non-PSN individuals into leadership roles.
bulletpoints: Identifying and supporting ethical leadership alternatives.
Undermining PSN control by promoting decentralized decision-making models.
Implementing stealth infiltration techniques to take over key positions.
